case.title: SEXY, CARAMEL BEAUTY WOULD LOVE TO MEET A MATURE MALE.... (ATTRACTIVE, DOWN TO EARTH....DRIVEN...)
case.text:
Hello!!
I am OPEN to spending time to with a MATURE, ATTRACTIVE MALE that is RESPECTFUL, HANDSOME, CARING, LOVES HIS MOM...IS A GENTLEMEN and is down to earth....funny and romantic...has his own place, no DRAMA,...NON SMOKER...and is about his biz!
Let's start with a brief convo.....Hang out. See if we vibe...have some coffee...talk....take a walk...or just hang.....no pressure.... I am 5'5...slim...toned...caramel.:wavy hair...Brown eyes:nice smile and physique.
I am a BUSY ENTREPRENEUR......NO TIME FOR GAMES... SO....please tell me about you in FIRST EMAIL....AND PIC...THANKS
I am down to earth....intelligent...Funny, cool and attractive.....I will send a better pic when I receive yours...... hopefully we can link up this evening nothing crazy just cool free energy live good friend if nothing more but who knows send a pic take it from there talk to you soon!!
CIAO!
